name: dittofeed
description: Dittofeed is a self-hosted platform for customer engagement through email and messaging campaigns. It includes segmentation, automated workflows, templates, and analytics, designed for marketing teams.
features: Email Campaigns: Create and send targeted email marketing. Engage customers effectively.
Customer Segmentation: Group users by behavior and attributes. Precise targeting.
Automated Workflows: Trigger messages based on user actions. Smart engagement automation.
Template System: Design beautiful emails with reusable templates. Professional communications.
Analytics Dashboard: Track campaign performance and engagement. Data-driven decisions.
Self-Hosted: Own your customer engagement platform. Complete data privacy and control.
